document.full_text: the three candidates bidding to host the 2018 winter olympics entered the final campaign stretch with no clear frontrunner emerging after an international olympic committee (ioc) evaluation report was issued on tuesday.
document.title: no frontrunner in 2018 winter games race
lines_and_colors: the three candidates bidding to host the 2018 winter olympics entered the final campaign stretch with no clear frontrunner emerging after an international olympic committee (ioc) evaluation report was issued on tuesday.
